"A.P.242/2/13": "<%me>! Remember that weird ARKS that attacked you out of the blue...?"
"Hey, <%me>!"
"Did you hear the news? There's been a new class established!"
"Its name is... \"Phantom\"!"

"And guess what else?! The Phantom trainer is...
one of my friends!"

"Stratos. A Hero should not speak of Phantoms...
It's unbecoming."
"...Hm? You are here too, Guardian."
"Huh? <%me>, do you know each other?"
"We are not that close. But that reminds me, I've yet to introduce myself. My name is..."
"Kyokuya, the \"Black Wolf\". I am the Phantom class representative. You would do well to remember that."
"Nice to meet you, Kyokuya."
"What's the \"Black Wolf\" for?"
"You forgot the \"Black Wolf\"... Engrave it upon your heart."
"Oh... has it piqued your interest? However, the hour is not yet ripe... The day will come when you will be made aware."
"Oh, right. Tell us about Phantom, Kyo!"
"My name is Kyokuya! Do not fashion me with unpleasant nicknames!"
"Whaaat, why not? I've been calling you that since we were kids. Besides, it's you..."
"...Silence. I have no intention of colluding with the \"Heroes\" who blind themselves to truth with their justice."
"What are you saying? Heroes protect everyone's hopes and peace."
"...How foolish. Have you still not realized... that your justice is meaningless?"
"What a Phantom sees is reality. Their goals are met regardless of such trivial notions... as justice and evil."
"Ooh... you're so mean, Kyo. You used to be such a nice kid..."
"Gh... f-fine! You asked about Phantom. I will explain it to you."
"To succeed as a Phantom, one must act as though they are a \"shadow\". Paramount to that is the concept of \"evasive action\"."
"One who has mastered such a skill becomes capable of avoiding incoming attacks and retaliating with strong counterattacks."
"Furthermore, Phantom's Photon Arts possess a hidden power to them... They must be employed accordingly with the situation."
"Let us not forget the \"decay\". Phantom's true strength... shows itself when pitted against those suffering decay."
"Dancing among the shadows and making proper use of both sides of their offense, drowning enemies wrought with decay in fear..."

"Much like a departed spirit... That is the
Phantom's fighting style."
"That spits in the face of justice. Taking a strong enemy head-on in glorious battle is the only way!"
"...Guardian. Do you share Stratos's sentiments? Is justice the only ideal worth holding on to...?"
"Justice is all that matters."
"It's not necessarily the only way."
"Hmph, I see... I had thought you capable of understanding, but it seems I overestimated you."
"Ho? ...I was certain you would sympathize with Stratos, but it appears you are capable of making your own judgements."

"...Show me whether you are prepared to discard your justice and become a spirit with your
actions."
"...Farewell."
"Kyo! That was all so rude... Only cowards run away!"
"<%me>... I'm really sorry about all of that..."
"We actually go way back... Back then, the three of us were all good friends... but something happened."
"Because of that something, I... I closed off my heart. I was inconsolable, and wouldn't even speak."
"Kyo tried all sorts of things to cheer me up... But nothing worked."
"I think he got fed up with me. He's acted like that ever since then... He must hate me."
"But he's really not a bad person! He might act like that... but he's really kind-hearted!"
"So...please don't think poorly of him! Excuse me!"
"<%me>. My report got interrupted, but I think you understand the situation now."
"The representative of the new \"Phantom\" class... We can assume Kyokuya attacked you earlier to gauge your power... probably."
"You're always contributing to the development of new classes, so you must have caught his eye."
"Still, if he and Stratos are friends... Then that makes them rivals!"
